ComicInfo.Title: The Change In Your Nature Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
The hunt is on! Chromia and Prowl launch a massive security operation, desperately trying to track down two murderers. Bumblebee visits an injured Windblade, Orion Pax, Sentinel Prime, and Megatron wrestle for control and influence—and nobody knows whose side (if anyone’s) Termagax and Starscream are on in all of this!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Winston Chan | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Umi Miyao | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Blacky Shepherd (a) & Josh Burcham (c) | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 21:27:10. [CVDB722893]
